name: Death Race (itch) (deathracegroup)
description:
Welcome to Death Race, a unique blend between anti-gravity racing and deadly combat. Death Race creates an interesting blend between both, by making shooting-and driving go hand in hand. By adding Mario-Kart like Power-Ups, the game gets rounded off beautifully.

We also feature ship-customization, where you can choose ship, weapons and paint-job to your liking.

We at the Death Race Group are happy to launch a first official version, and hope you enjoy our game.

Thanks, and have fun!
